name: Gekitou Power Modeller
summary: School is over for you and your friend Louis. Summer vacation has begun, and Louis hears about an upcoming tournament involving modelers and is excited about his chances. He is dismayed, however, when he remembers that your allowance cannot cover the cost of a model. He has been saving for quite some time and only has enough for one part. Your Mother has a surprise for you however. You won the grand prize in the model contest that you entered! The grand prize is one model of your choosing. Filled with confidence from your new model, you decide to enter the tournament.
